definition: to allow/to grant/in accordance with/in the light of
to beat/to hit/variant of 考[kao3]/to inspect/to test/to take an exam
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

sentences.english: Candidates can attend the test with he admission ticket issued by the testing site.
sentences.chinese: 考生持主考单位核发的“准考证”进入考场参加考试。

sentences.english: What if I did not complete my candidate number?
sentences.chinese: 如果我没有填写完整的准考证号在答题卡上怎么办？

sentences.english: Please come in person to apply and take the test pass.
sentences.chinese: 考生须本人亲自到报名处报名，领取准考证。

sentences.english: Five minutes before the time is the hair volume, the examinee fill out the ticket.
sentences.chinese: 考前五分钟是发卷时间，考生填写准考证。

sentences.english: Students who participate in public exams or license exams and have the exam permit can apply for leave for official duty.
sentences.chinese: 参加公务人员考试或检定考试，而持有准考证者。

sentences.english: Take your admission ticket and photo ID to the test center.
sentences.chinese: 携带准考证和带有照片的身份证明到考场。

sentences.english: Driving was to wait for verification to the lobby to wait for admission ticket issued.
sentences.chinese: 到驾校后来到待考大厅等候发准考证。

sentences.english: And then to the admissibility of post operational test and receive the admission ticket booking and express certificates.
sentences.chinese: 然后到业务受理岗预约考试并领取准考证和速递凭证。

definition: exam candidate/student whose name has been put forward for an exam
evidence (that one can rely on)/grounds (for believing sth)
the exam area/the district where an exam takes place
